main.name: Tom McNally
main.description: with a broad experience and proficiency in numerous technologies, methodologies and testing techniques.  Several of my strengths are being team oriented and able to deliver on projects in a timely manner. I have served in numerous roles within a software development team with great success.
main.bio: I am an adaptive and creative Software Engineer who is passionate about software and hardware design, and the challenges that lie within. My specialty is a full stack Java Engineer, including api and system integrations. I consider myself an extremely dynamic Engineer ready to take on any challenge and learn about your technology in order to solve the problem that stands in front of me.

education.description: I was lucky to be able to study a topic that I have always loved, and I made numerous life long friends.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: NTT is a fast paced, dynamic work environment.  This allows me to master numerous technologies and techniques and being able to think quickly on my feet to complete tasks. For instance, I was able to transition the application from Spring MVC to PrimeFaces and JSF in 8 months.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: During my time at First Data Corporation, I worked on a jsp/servlet application that we implemented our own version of a MVC model.  We needed to do this because this was the early days of struts and other such MVC frameworks.  Also,I was the trainer/mentor for all new developers on the team.

testimonials.text: Tom has mentored me throughout my software engineering career in more ways than I can count. As a senior software developer, Tom has been exposed to a multitude of problems and has demonstrated high-level problem solving skills time and again.
